infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to share it in trip chat.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access to share photos in trip chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need photo library access to share photos in trip chat.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Aagam Holidays to access your location to share in trip chat.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Aagam Holidays to access your photos to share in trip chat.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Aagam Holidays to access your camera to take photos for trip chat.
